title: Hot-dogger!
brief_description: A non-narrated look at the world of freestyle skiing. Shows serial flips, ballet and mogul skiing, and uses extreme slow motion to show skiers almost motionless inmidair as they fly thorugh single, double and Moebius flips. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
